title.value: Влияние скармливания комбикорма с включением трепела на переваримость и использование питательных веществ молодняком крупного рогатого скота
Effect of feeding young cattle with compound feed with tripoli on digestibility and nutrients utilization
Effect of feeding young cattle with compound feed with tripoli on digestibility and nutrients utilization

journal.title: Zootechnical Science of Belarus: collection of scientific papers

person.name: Shnitko, E.A., National Academy of Sciences. Scientific and Practical Center of Animal Breeding (Belarus)

abstract.value: Results of the experience lead in conditions of physiological case RUP Science-practical centre on animal breeding of the National academy of sciences of Belarus on clinically healthy bulls of black-motley breed are described in article. 4 groups of animals (on 3 heads in everyone) in the age of 4-5 months, live weight 145-148 kg have been generated. It is established, that inclusion of tripoli in diet structure of young growth of large horned livestock is stimulated the digestion processes, expressed in quantity increase of LZHK at 2,8-7,4% and nitrogen on 7,7-12,1% in rumen contents. Use of tripoli in bulls' feeding promotes nutrients digestibility increase on 2,25-12,9 pp. and improvement to use of nitrogen on 7,2-10,3 pp. Feeding of tripoli in structure of compound fodder optimizes of rumen digestion processes at bulls and creates more favorable conditions for ability to rumen microflora live. Input of tripoli in ration structure for bulls' fattened improves also use of mineral substances
